name: material mapping
desc: This module can re-assign data for the purpose of grouping.

properties.name: Value Type
properties.desc: The Value Type radio selector determines the type of data to be modified.

properties.name: Activate Mapping
properties.desc: The Activate Mapping toggle turns on or off the current material mapping.

properties.name: From Value
properties.desc: The From Value specifies the starting range to map from.

properties.name: To Value
properties.desc: The To Value specifies the ending range to map from.

properties.name: Map Value
properties.desc: The Map Value specifies the desired value to map everything from the From Value to the To Value to.

properties.name: Map Name
properties.desc: The Name for the Mapped Material.  This is used when creating the Geology Legend port.
